alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 11:44PM CDT until March 12 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Grant County in central Arkansas... Central Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 1130 PM CST. * At 1044 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sheridan to near Carthage to 9 miles east of Sparkman, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... Fordyce... Star City... Rison... White Hall... Altheimer... Leola... Grady... Kingsland... Carthage... Whitefield... Plantersville... Woodville... Tipton... Dogwood... Herbine... Nebo... Feenyville... Lamont... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Grant; Jefferson; Lincoln
